settings.name: Compact Window
settings.hint: Removes the window title bar, and makes the sheet appear more compact.

settings.name: Compact Layout
settings.hint: Reducs the spacing between items on the sheet to save space.

settings.name: Compact Features
settings.hint: Reduces the space taken up by features. When this setting is enabled, each feature will take up only two lines of space. Hovering your mouse over a fature will reveal the full description. Features can be expanded/compacted individually by clicking on them.

font-size.label: Font Size
font-size.NaN-error: Font size must be a number.

settings.name: Font Size
settings.hint: Set the font size, in pixels, for text in the sheet. Other aspects of the sheet will scale accordingly, reducing font size will make the entire sheet much smaller while increasing it improves readablity.

settings.name: Generated Attack Descriptions
settings.hint: Show automatically generated attack descriptions by default.

settings.name: Generated Casting Features
settings.hint: Show automatically generated casting features by default.

settings.name: Display Secrets Inline
settings.hint: By default, display blocks of secret text inline like all other text? Otherwise, display inline blocks as styled blocks of text.

settings.name: Hide Secrets
settings.hint: By default, hide secret blocks of text from the sheet.

settings.name: Hide Image
settings.hint: By default, don't show the creature's image on the sheet (more accurate).

settings.name: Show Lair Actions
settings.hint: By default, show Lair Actions (not normally included in 5e monster stat-blocks).

settings.name: Show Current Hit Points
settings.hint: By default, display the current hit point in the hit points field. If neither maximum nor minimum Hit Points are shown, the average will be calculated and displayed.

settings.name: Show Maximum Hit Points
settings.hint: By default, display the current hit point in the hit points field. If neither maximum nor minimum Hit Points are shown, the average will be calculated and displayed.

settings.name: Maximum Height Offset
settings.hint: The maximum height of a Monster Blocks window is based on the height of the browser viewport, minus this offset. The default value of 72 is the height of the macro bar plus 10px of padding. If you prefer statblocks to be tall and narrow, reduce this value. If you prefer that stat blocks be wider (more columns) increase this value.

settings.name: Default Theme
settings.hint: Choose which theme applies by default.

settings.name: Default Custom Theme Class
settings.hint: The class name used for your default custom theme.

settings.name: Editing Enabled
settings.hint: Choose whether or not editing is enabled by default.

settings.name: Show Non-Proficient Skills and Saves
settings.hint: Choose whether or not showing not-proficient skills and saves is enabled by default.

settings.name: Show resource values
settings.hint: Choose whether or not showing resource values by default.

settings.name: Always show skills & saves
settings.hint: Choose whether or not to show empty skill and save lists by default.

MOBLOKS5E.physicalDamage: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
MOBLOKS5E.EditButtonHint: Click the + button above to add features
MOBLOKS5E.CastingStats: (spell save DC {savedc}, {bonus} to hit with spell attacks).
MOBLOKS5E.CasterSpellsPreped: The {name}{atwill} has the following spells prepared:
MOBLOKS5E.WarlockSpellsPreped: It{atwill} has the following warlock spells prepared:
MOBLOKS5E.InnateSpellsKnown: The {name} can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
MOBLOKS5E.WarlockSlotRegain: It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest.
MOBLOKS5E.AttackVersatile: or {damage} damage if used with two hands
MOBLOKS5E.LegendaryText: The {name} can take {number} legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The {name} regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
MOBLOKS5E.LairText: On initiative count 20 (losing all initiative ties), the {name} takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the {name} can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:
